name: Sunho Lim
content: Sunho Lim, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University TTU Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Sunho Lim, Ph.D. Associate Professor CS Email: sunho.lim@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.7595 Fax: 806.742.3519 Office: EC 310 Mailing Address: Texas Tech UniversityDepartment of Computer ScienceBox 43104Lubbock, TX 79409−3104 Research Group Website: T Square WISTOR:TTU Wireless Mobile Networking Laboratory Personal Website:Lim Website Research Interests Cybersecurity Mobile Data Management and Privacy Aerial Computing Wireless Networks and Mobile Computing Personal Information Curriculum Vitae Education Ph.D., Computer Science and Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University, (2005) M.S., Computer Engineering, Hankuk Aviation University (Korea Aerospace University), (1998) B.S., Computer Science, Hankuk Aviation University (Korea Aerospace University), (1996) Department of Computer Science Like Department of Computer Science on FacebookLike Department of Computer Science on Facebook Follow Department of Computer Science on InstagramFollow Department of Computer Science on Instagram Connect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedInConnect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedIn Address Texas Tech University, Box 43104 | Lubbock, TX 79409-3104 Phone 806.742.3527 Email cs@ttu.edu © 2025 Texas Tech University Apr 16, 2025 3:15 PM
